title: ralle14
author: ralle14
content: Try lang baka may interesado kumuha dito, I'm selling three pieces of Shopee Gift Card (1000php) for 0.9 mBTC each. Willing to take the loss as i've paid 1.29mBTC for each card. Lahat ng gift cards ay freshly bought from Coinsbee, I can show the invoice if needed. I can also lower the price even further if bibilhin lahat.RFS: The gift cards aren't stackable and nag iba yung gift card provider ng Coinsbee sa Shopee. Dati kasi top up style siya na pede ka mag cash in ng balance via ShopeePay pero ngayon voucher form na siya.
